verses.verse: I <S%H2199>cry<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> With my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> I ask <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for <S%H2603>mercy.<s%>
I pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5046>him.<s%> I tell <S%H6440>him<s%> my <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>

When my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> within <S%H3045>me,<s%> you knew my <S%H5410>path.<s%> In the <S%H734>way<s%> in <S%H2098>which<s%> I <S%H1980>walk,<s%> they have <S%H2934>hidden<s%> a snare for <S%H6341>me.<s%>

<S%H5027>Look<s%> on my <S%H3225>right,<s%> and <S%H7200>see;<s%> for there is no one who is <S%H5234>concerned<s%> for <S%H4498>me.<s%> Refuge has <S%H6>fled<s%> from <S%H1875>me.<s%> No one cares for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
I <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh. I <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are my <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> my <S%H2506>portion<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>"

<S%H7181>Listen<s%> to my <S%H7440>cry,<s%> for I <S%H1809>am<s%> in <S%H3966>desperate<s%> <S%H1809>need.<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from my <S%H7291>persecutors,<s%> For they are stronger than <S%H553>me.<s%>

<S%H3318>Bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H4525>prison,<s%> that I may give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to your <S%H8034>name.<s%> The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H3803>surround<s%> <S%H1580>me,<s%> for you will be good to me.
